description: This file defines an asynchronous script that sets up a financial agent using various imported modules, and runs an event-driven process to handle and print different events related to the agent's operation, such as tool calls and responses.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an agent with specific tools and a model, capable of executing asynchronous runs with event streaming.

methods.name: run_agent_with_events
methods.description: Asynchronous function that runs the agent with a given prompt, handling and printing various event types during execution.
